instructions: Connect your device to your Mac. You can connect your device using a USB or USB-C cable or using a Wi-Fi connection. To turn on Wi-Fi syncing, see Sync content between your Mac and iPhone or iPad over Wi-Fi . In the Finder on your Mac, select the device in the Finder sidebar. Select TV Shows in the button bar. Select the Sync TV shows onto [ device name ] checkbox to turn on syncing of your TV shows. With the checkbox selected, syncing is set to transfer all your TV shows to your device. To sync a selection of TV shows, select the Automatically include checkbox; choose the number of newest, newest unwatched, or the number of oldest unwatched TV shows from the menu; then choose to include all shows or selected shows from the episodes menu. Select the checkboxes for the individual TV shows you want to sync in the TV Shows list. Deselect the checkbox for any TV show you don t want to sync. Click TV Shows or Playlists to see your content organized by that category. When you re ready to sync, click Apply.
